titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7673

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Frankfort, Aug 25 1862
Hon
D. C. Wicklliffe
Sec State. The following Commissions have been issued & delivered viz:

✓D. J. Harling Colonel
✓L. A. Gratz 1st Major
✓Robert McCord 2d Major
✓W. O. Watts Adjutant
✓George Sambrook Qr. Master
✓John Dry Capt:
✓Edward Penn Capt:
✓S. T. Gebhard 2 Lieut:
✓G. I. Brothers 1 Lieut:
✓P. G. Lanham Capt:
✓M. H. Kimberlin 1 Lieut:
✓D. G Cheatham 2 Lieut:
✓W H Fiddler Capt
✓James McCown 1 Lieut
✓W H Mead 1 Lieut
✓Saml. W. Crandall 1 Lieut
✓G. W. Cravens Capt:
✓W. Murphy 2 Lieut:

Harvy J. Burns -- Captain
Turner W. Bottom -- 1st Lieut
Cincinnattus Hendren 2d Lieut } dated 18 aug 1862

Joseph N. Luckett Captain
Samuel Porter 1 Lieut:
John A. Mobley 2 Lieut: } Do.

Tho. J. Hardin Capt:
Theodorick J. Macey 1 Lieut:
John C. Jackson 2 Lieut: } Dated Aug. 18. 1862

John D. Gore Capt:
Charles W. Quiggins 1 Lieut:
Dennis W. Gore 2 Lieut: } Do

Wm A. Smyth Capt:
John C. Brent 1 Lieut:
Milton P. Hodges 2 Lieut: } Do

Urijah W. Oldham Capt:
Saml. D. McMeekin 1 Lieut:
Lilburn A. Black 2 Lieut: } Do

John L. Neal Captain
Moses A. Dean 1st Lieut:
John W. Jenkins 2d. Lieut: } Do

Benja M. Harny Captain
Frank H. Pope 1st Lieut:
Alfred C. Morris 2d. Lieut
John Speed 2d Lieut: Sup of Capt. Harny's Compy } Do

✓ Henry Sutton 1 Lieut: date 25 Aug 1862
✓ Gideon J. Stivers 2 " " " " "
✓ F. W. Steadman 2 " " " " "
✓ Z. S. Straube 2 " " " " "
Ben Newkirk 2 " " " " "
Alexander M. Barnes Qr Master & dated Aug 25, 1862 --
Eli H. Murray Colo date Aug 13, 1862
James M. Holmes Lt Colo date Aug 13, 1862

James GS Jackson pro: (Nov 26, 1862 date of Com)
Alvin C. Gillen -- pro: (May 1, 1862 -- " " ")

Respectfully
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl Ky Vols:
